menu: Select the desired currency or write it yourself, if you need to convert, add it after the currency name:

exchange rate.currency user error: >_< Unintelligible team! Select the currency from the keys, or write it correctly
exchange rate.server error: >_< The server is temporarily down, try again later

inline mode.server error: >_< The server is temporarily down, try again later
inline mode.user error: >_< Incorrectly written currency or conversion amount
inline mode.warning: To convert currency, add the amount to be converted
inline mode.warning info: To convert in inline mode you need to add the conversion amount. For example: "uah 11", "GBP 57" etc...
inline mode.choose error: Currency was not written, try again
